introduction: 少女阿夢在一家名為「廿七俱樂部」的唱片店打工。每天在白日夢裡幻想：假想朋友Kurt Cobain能把她從了無生氣的生活中拯救出來。面對著廿七歲生日的逼近，她透過向死而生的想像，打破對成長的迷思。A coming-of-age short depicts main character, Yumi and her record store coworker, as they experience existential dread about turning 27 years old, the age that many western rock stars passed. Between day dreaming and questioning their live's direction, the two supervise the record store and its quirky cast of customers and get up to their own shenanigans in the process.
